original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down, t-bills up at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were down while t-bills edged up at close on Wednesday, following a bill auction dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 30.25/75 percent on Tuesday, down from 30.25/75 percent on Monday.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 27.90/28.00 percent, down from 27.90/28.00 percent from Monday.
The one-year bill closed at 23.00/24.00 percent, down from its last close at 23.00/24.00percent. (Colombo/ March22/2023)
